After working with House leadership to ensure OR rural counties were not left behind in the FY20 funding bill, I’m pleased the bill includes a 2-year extension of the Secure Rural Schools program, which provides vital funding for schools, law enforcement, and roads.

Last year, the #GOPTaxScam allowed America’s largest corporations to pay an effective tax rate of 11.3%. Nearly 100 Fortune 500 companies paid NOTHING in federal taxes. I've secured a huge win for OR Pacific groundfish fisheries today—the federal govt is expected to forgive a multi-million dollar interest burden created by bureaucratic incompetence. Proud to have worked with @SenJeffMerkley, @RonWyden & @RepSchrader to finally right this wrong.

Because of pharmaceutical companies’ price gouging, Americans pay more out-of-pocket for Rx drugs than individuals in any other country. It’s beyond time for Congress to act to deliver immediate relief. That’s why  I voted for H.R. 3, the Elijah Cummings Lower Drug Costs Now Act. pic.twitter.com/kcS88JFsHw

Our oceans, which are so important to Oregon's coastal communities and our planet, have absorbed nearly 1/3 of human-caused carbon emissions, increasing acidity and harming marine life. We need a #BlueNewDeal to protect our oceans and the communities that depend on them.

Today I voted against the National Defense Authorization Act. The Oregon coast is already experiencing the effects of climate change. That's why I voted for HR 729 to create and improve programs to help prepare for & respond to climate change, protecting coastal residents, fish habitat, improving working waterfronts.
